name: line-length-warning
description: Line Length Warning can help you with tracking your lines' lengths. It will mark your 'out of bound' code by highlighting it.

line-length-warning.warn_color.description: Warning length of the line will be indicated with this color

line-length-warning.warn_line.description: After this number of characters extention will warn you

line-length-warning.alert_color.description: Alert length of the line will be indicated with this color

line-length-warning.alert_line.description: After this number of characters extention will alert you

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
